data.name: Avila y Pacheco reductions
data.desc: Gov of Yuc orders a three-pronged reduction of rebelled Ma in W, NE, SE Yuc [SE Yuc inc Bacalar province]
data.agents_sp: Gov Enrique de Avila y Pacheco, Juan de Salazar, Fr Martín Tejero, Capt Gaspar León de Salazar, Fr Bartolomé Becerril, Antonio Magaña de Solis = Antonio Orantes Solis, Fr Pedro de la Peña
data.prim_n: MEXICO,244 [Méritos y servicios de Antonio de Magaña y Solis a sd 1644]  / ESCRIBANIA,308A [Testimonio a sd 1644] / Cogolludo lib 12 cap 1
data.note:
5 Mar 1643 Bishop of Yuc informs Sp Crown SE Yuc reduced in 6 pueblos 'hasta 130 familias' /v Barke B 50 /MEXICO,369 folder 3 ff 529r-531v [a Mérida a 5 mar 1643] /
 Three parties of reduction = Salazar at Valladolid, Chancenote, Cozumel / León de Salazar at Campeachy / Magaña de Solis at Ichmul and Bacalar province /v Jones /
 Results = W Yuc, 2442 reduced / SE Yuc inc Bacalar province, 1900 reduced / NE Yuc 5081 reduced / Total = 9,423 reduced /v Jones 1
